SELECT bf.`code` as parentCode,bf.`name` as parentName FROM bd_businessfield bf INNER JOIN ( SELECT tf.* from ( SELECT t.id,t.sp_id FROM ( SELECT template.* FROM sps_bill_temp_corp temcorp INNER JOIN sps_bill_template template ON temcorp.temp_id = template.id WHERE temcorp.cp_id = #{cmid} AND template.sp_id = #{spid} AND template.is_effect = 'Y' AND template.is_default = 'N' AND template.dr = 0 and temcorp.dr = 0 UNION SELECT template.* FROM sps_bill_template template WHERE template.sp_id = #{spid} AND template.is_effect = 'Y' AND template.is_default = 'Y' AND template.dr = 0 ) t LIMIT 1) m INNER JOIN sps_bill_temp_business_field tf ON tf.temp_id = m.id and tf.dr = 0
) lf ON lf.field_id = bf.field_id AND bf.source = 'INSURANCEFUND_SINGLE'

SELECT din.code as parentCode,din.name as parentName,bf.`code` as childCode,bf.`name` as childName FROM bs_arearatio area INNER JOIN bd_insurance din ON area.insurance_id = din.insurance_id AND din.insurance_fund_type = #{in_type} INNER JOIN bd_insurancefields fs ON fs.insurance_id = din.insurance_id INNER JOIN bd_businessfield bf ON bf.field_id = fs.field_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT em.insurance_area FROM sps_empmonthfee em INNER JOIN sp_cm_relation re ON em.cp_id = re.cp_id AND re.cp_id = #{cmid} INNER JOIN sps_empinsurancedetail ins ON em.id = ins.emp_fee_id GROUP BY em.insurance_area) t ON t.insurance_area = area.area_id GROUP BY din.code,bf.code ORDER BY din.insurance_fund_type desc,din.insurance_id ASC,bf.field_id ASC
